sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>We have introduced a logic where the fields Department and Location on entity will be populated from applies to record. This script is to fix the data for existing customer who are upgrading from previous versions.</description> <name>Update new discrete fields on entity</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[gs.eventQueue('sn_grc.update_discrete_fields_entity',null,null,null);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-12-15 10:57:46</sys_created_on> <sys_id>33bba2ff531401105b63ddeeff7b1264</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Update new discrete fields on entity</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="">53f81621cb200200829cf865734c9c58</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="">53f81621cb200200829cf865734c9c58</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_33bba2ff531401105b63ddeeff7b1264</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-12-16 16:10:43</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
